channel.title: Posts on Talkys Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Talkys Blog

item.title: Github pages and paths
item.description: While setting this blog I had a big trouble getting the file paths the right way. I don’t want to link hugo to my github, so uploading the static files should be fine, but getting the baseURL to work was a nightmare. The photophobia theme that I’m using right now is a pain to set up. But at least I’ve managed to get it to work by trial and error as I could not find any documentation for working like that.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: This is a silly blog created to express my opinion about the world of computing. The idea of starting a blog is purely to relax my mind while writing something that maybe someone out there finds interesting. I don’t have an orthodox mind when it comes to technology, and most of the time, I find myself complaining about how things work, how they should work, and how I would implement them (even if I never will).
